articles.content: Humans are constantly exposed to diverse microbes, which can have positive and adverse health effects. Considerable exposure the these microorganisms occurs indoors, with the highest bacterial coloni… [+6068 chars]

articles.title: Light-Speed Advances: Graphene Nanoprocessing With a Femtosecond Laser - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers at Tohoku University used a femtosecond laser to successfully micro/nanofabricate graphene films, creating multi-point holes without damage and removing contaminants. The technique could replace traditional, more complex methods, offering potentia…
articles.content:
